text: Dead Wake: The Last Crossing of the Lusitania is a 2015 New York Times non- fiction bestseller written by author Erik Larson. The book looks at the sinking of Lusitania during World War I and the events surrounding the sinking. ==Awards== The book was named Book of the Year in the History Category by World Magazine. It won the Goodreads Choice Award for History & Biography in 2015. ==Reception== According to Amazon, Dead Wake was one of the 10 bestselling books of 2015. ==References== == External links == * Book Page on Author's Official Website * The New York Times Book Review Category:2015 non-fiction books Category:World War I books
